category: news
title: "Canonical steps up its support for machine learning development with Charmed MLFlow"
excerpt: "Charmed MLFlow is Canonical’s distribution of the popular open-source MLFlow platform, which is used to manage the end-to-end machine learning model lifecycle. It benefits from various integrations with Canonical’s software, simpler deployment and management, and regular security patches."
